episode.title: Cariboo Signals - Arts, Culture & Digital Storytelling
episode.description:
Riley and Casey explore technology and society in rural communities. Today's focus: Arts, Culture & Digital Storytelling.

NEWS ROUNDUP: We break down [The Tyee] BC Separatists Met in Campbell River. So Did Pro-Canada Protesters and [The Tyee] Juno Winner Dominique Fils-Aimé Comes to the Chan Centre, plus 1 more stories, and explore what these developments mean for communities like ours.

RURAL CONNECTIONS: Deep dive into arts, culture & digital storytelling, discussing how rural and remote communities can thoughtfully adopt and adapt emerging technologies.

Hosts: Riley (Tech systems thinker with rural roots) and Casey (Community development focus).
